item.title: Feedback Loops
item.description: Like a [[notes/SOP Solver |SOP Solver]] in Houdini! The setup is a little different but the same logic applies. A TOP feedback loop is regularly used to blur, fade or transform pixels like you usually do with attributes in Houdini.

item.title: Houdini and Nuke to TouchDesigner
item.description: TouchDesigner was born as a fork of [[notes/Houdini |Houdini]] 4.1, which shows in some methodologies and naming conventions. From a [[notes/Nuke |Nuke]] compositing standpoint there are many similarities when it comes to 2D image manipulation as well.
